flags.title: User-Contributed Project
flags.text: This project guide is not managed by MAKE staff.

guide.summary: To make a Bin Bug, you use a recycled 'car carrier' gum container (gum in a container that you can find at any store) and decorate him with 9 easy steps. A Bin Bug's purpose is to hold items you love while decorating you dresser or night stand without you
guide.title: Bin Bug
